subject: Indecency, Obscenity and Profanity
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Houston Dynamo midfielder Colin Clark was suspended for three games and fined for directing a gay slur toward a ball boy during a recent game.
snippet: Houston Dynamo midfielder Colin Clark was suspended for three games and fined for directing a gay slur toward a ball boy during a recent game.
